Package skywaysolutions.app.database

Class DatabaseEntityBase

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.database.DatabaseEntityBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
Account, Blank, BlankType, ConversionRate, Customer, Discount, FlexibleDiscountEntry, Refund, Sale, Transaction
public abstract class DatabaseEntityBase extends Object
This class provides a base class that is used by all database stored entities. Any extending classes should also have a constructor that takes a IDB_Connector and ResultSet as this should be used by the corresponding extender of DatabaseTableBase.loadOneFrom(ResultSet, boolean) and DatabaseTableBase.noLoadOneFrom(ResultSet). This constructor should also contain a setLoadedAndExists() call and use the DatabaseEntityBase(IDB_Connector, boolean) should be used for the super constructor.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    • deleteAuxRow

      protected abstract boolean deleteAuxRow() throws CheckedException
      This should delete the auxiliary row corresponding to the current object. Use IDB_Connector.getStatement(String) to get a PreparedStatement. ^ Don't forget to use the try([resource]) {} Use getAuxTableName() to get the auxiliary table name. DO NOT use any public functions provided by DatabaseEntityBase in here otherwise a deadlock could occur.
      Returns:
      If the row deletion occurred.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • lock

      public final void lock() throws CheckedException
      This locks the object allowing it to have load() and store() operate. DO NOT forget to unlock() once finished.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • unlock

      public final void unlock() throws CheckedException
      This unlocks the object allowing it to be used by other connections. See: lock()
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • markLocked

      public final void markLocked()
      Marks the entity as locked (Must exist). Used for DatabaseTableBase.lockAll() on cache objects.

    • markUnlocked

      public final void markUnlocked()
      Marks the entity unlocked. Used for when DatabaseTableBase.unlockAll(boolean) is called in order to make sure entities returned by DatabaseTableBase.loadMany(IFilterStatementCreator, MultiLoadSyncMode) with MultiLoadSyncMode.KeepLockedAfterLoad are marked unlocked (This needs to be done manually).

    • markDeleted

      public final void markDeleted()
      Marks the entity deleted. Used for DatabaseTableBase.deleteAll() on cache objects.

    • isLocked

      public final boolean isLocked()
      Returns if this object is in use by this connection and can be loaded and stored.
      Returns:
      If the object is locked.

    • checkRowExistence

      protected abstract boolean checkRowExistence() throws CheckedException
      This should check if the row corresponding to the current object exists. ( COUNT(*) and WHERE is your friend) Use IDB_Connector.getStatement(String) to get a PreparedStatement. ^ Don't forget to use the try([resource]) {} Use getTableName() to get the table name. DO NOT use any public functions provided by DatabaseEntityBase in here otherwise a deadlock could occur.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • exists

      public final boolean exists(boolean update) throws CheckedException
      Gets if the object exists in its table.
      Parameters:
      update - Whether to recheck the table.
      Returns:
      If the object exists.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • load

      public final void load() throws CheckedException
      Loads the object's contents. isLocked() should be true.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • store

      public final void store() throws CheckedException
      Stores the object's contents. isLocked() should be true. However, if exists(boolean) is false, then the object is created and isLocked() should be false.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • delete

      public final void delete() throws CheckedException
      Deletes an object. isLocked() should be true. The object is implicitly unlocked once deleted.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • isLoaded

      public final boolean isLoaded()
      Gets if the object is loaded.
      Returns:
      If the object is loaded.

    • setLockedState

      protected final void setLockedState(boolean locked)
      Sets the locked state. Used for loadFrom(ResultSet, boolean).
      Parameters:
      locked - The lock state.
